alert.note: Alert for McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:02PM CDT until July 29 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GOLDEN VALLEY...NORTHERN BILLINGS AND SOUTH CENTRAL MCKENZIE COUNTIES... At 602 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles east of Trotters, or 29 miles northeast of Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Grassy Butte around 640 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Elkhorn State Natural Area and Fairfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
